clues.text:
A full-course meal available from Douglas Adams:
"The Restaurant at the End of the ____"

A Harlan Ellison classic:
"I Have No Mouth & I Must ____"

Rick Deckard is on the hunt:
"Do Androids Dream of ____ ____"

By Ursula K. Le Guin:
"The Left Hand of ____"
Richard K. Morgan's tale of cyberwarriors: "Altered ____"
"Heavenly" term for a high-net-worth individual who supplies a start-up with cash in exchange for a piece of the business
To be this food "profitable" means to cover basic expenses like the same-named Maruchan instant noodles
"Do you think you have the" this word "to do more work?"--the word has expanded to mean more than just "data capacity"
It's an 8-letter portmanteau word for a product that has no cost upfront but has cost for all of the supplemental stuff
No, our company didn't do this to keep people from seeing your dog's Halloween costume; the head of IG says it's "not a thing"
This Pennsylvania place gave its name to a railroad line seen on Monopoly boards
This mountain's  major peaks are named Liberty Cap, Point Success & Columbia Crest, which is actually the summit
The name of this state of northwest India means "land of the kings"
McMurdo Sound is an inlet of this, which, despite its name, is a deep bay of the Southern Ocean
In July 1429 a triumphant Joan of Arc stood near the French king as he was crowned in the cathedral in this city

rounds.category: SO SAYETH THE KING JAMES BIBLE

clues.text: In Genesis, "God blessed" humanity, saying "Make thee be fruitful, and" do this
"I am" these 2 letters, "the first and the last: and, what thou seest, write in a book"
"These are also the generations of Aaron and Moses in the day that the Lord spake with Moses" at this place
"And there was war again: and David went out, and fought with" this group, "and slew them with a great slaughter"
"And Joshua the son of Nun sent out of Shittim two men to spy secretly, saying, go view the land, even" this city
A supporting player might be termed a second banana or a second one of these instruments
The role of a second in one of these "affairs of honor" was to try to settle it without violence
The Second Amendment to the U.S. Constitution mentions "a well regulated" one of these
France's Second Republic lasted from 1848 to 1852; its Second this, ruled by Napoleon III, from 1852 to 1870
A second-degree burn may damage not just the outer layer of skin but this skin layer immediately beneath it
Someone may claim that you are one or maybe 2 sandwiches short of this outdoor event; how dare they!
A sage saying relates that a man who acts as his own this "has a fool for a client"
A rabbit relative comes at the start of this term meaning foolish or absurd
5 words of advice from his mama quoted often by Tom Hanks in a 1994 movie
Someone not smart, maybe in the way of computers, is deemed this palindromic number, a webpage error

rounds.comments: (Ken: You'll give us the taxonomic class; not the phylum, not the order--the class.)

The pangolin &
the aye-aye

The frogmouth &
the shoebill
The wobbegong & the skate: cartilaginous these

The matamata &
the basilisk
Giant scallop, Sydney rock oyster
Margaret Atwood's 1985 dystopian novel loses a letter & becomes a story about a malt beverage
Margaret Mitchell's Pulitzer winner drops a letter & is in a peaceful state with a zephyr
clues.response: One with the Wind (Gone with the Wind)

clues.text: Pearl Buck's novel about Wang Lung loses a letter & becomes a squishy planet
A Huxley novel loses a letter & its 5 castes of people attend a raging dance party
An Edith Wharton title drops a letter & laughter spews from a tube
clues.response: The Hose of Mirth (The House of Mirth)

clues.text: You pronounce the G in malignant, but not in this happier medical antonym
To remain or maintain rather than doing this, like King Amadeus of Spain did in 1873
Fertile is 180 degrees from this word the King James Bible uses about Rebekah & Elisabeth when childless
To misunderstand is an antonym for this word, which I understand is also a unit of nautical measurement
An "ant"onym of modern & fresh, it describes the time before the flood in the Bible
The Japuá & Juruá, tributaries of this river, are both over 1,000 miles long; its Madeira tributary is over 2,000 miles long!
The Han River joins it at Wuhan
A sheepish response is perhaps best for this, the largest tributary of the Yellowstone
The Morava River joins this big river near Smederevo, Serbia
The Ebola is a tributary of the Mongala; the Mongala & the Lualaba are tributaries of this other river
Head to the 55,000-acre Missouri lake named for this president to see the dam & the state park named for him
Arkansas' Crater of these State Park gave up "Uncle Sam", later cut up & sold for $150,000 in 1971 dollars
This Delaware nickname precedes Heritage Park, an urban "park without boundaries"
Experience more than a "Trace" of some big bass fishin' in the park named for Mississippi pol Bob M. Dearing 10 miles north of this city
Explore Warbler Road or Woodpecker Trail in the Kentucky state park named for this 19th century artist

rounds.text: 3 mighty city-states roughly forming an equilateral triangle were Venice, Florence & this one where the Viscontis & Sforzas ruled
